languages.text: "Ошибка маршала привела к падению всех Арбитес в Коронусе. Как глава Дома, я извлеку урок из этой истории".
languages.translation_comment: The RT disbanded the Arbites in the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: "Ошибка маршала привела к падению всех Арбитес в Коронусе. Как глава Дома, я извлеку урок из этой историй".

languages.text: "The Marshal's poor judgement led to the fall of the Adeptus Arbites in the Expanse. As the leader of my House, I must learn from this cautionary tale."
languages.translation_comment: The RT disbanded the Arbites in the Koronus Expanse.
languages.original_text: "Ошибка маршала привела к падению всех Арбитес в Коронусе. Как глава Дома, я извлеку урок из этой истории".

"The Marshal's poor judgement led to the fall of the Adeptus Arbites in the Expanse. As the leader of my House, I must learn from this cautionary tale."

languages.text: 「将帥の誤った判断が、このエクスパンスの高等裁定局の崩壊を招いたのです。我が家門の長たる者として、あたくしはこの戒めの物語から学ばねばなりません」
languages.original_text: "The Marshal's poor judgement led to the fall of the Adeptus Arbites in the Expanse. As the leader of my House, I must learn from this cautionary tale."

traits.locale_text: 「将帥の誤った判断が、このエクスパンスの高等裁定局の崩壊を招いたのです。我が家門の長たる者として、あたくしはこの戒めの物語から学ばねばなりません」

languages.text: "Das Fehlurteil des Marschalls hat zum Fall des Adeptus Arbites in der Ausdehnung geführt. Als Kopf meines Hauses muss ich aus dieser mahnenden Geschichte lernen."
languages.original_text: "The Marshal's poor judgement led to the fall of the Adeptus Arbites in the Expanse. As the leader of my House, I must learn from this cautionary tale."

traits.locale_text: "Das Fehlurteil des Marschalls hat zum Fall des Adeptus Arbites in der Ausdehnung geführt. Als Kopf meines Hauses muss ich aus dieser mahnenden Geschichte lernen."

languages.text: « L'erreur de jugement commise par le maréchal a entraîné la chute de l'Adeptus Arbites dans les étendues. En tant que dirigeante de ma maison, je dois considérer cet incident comme une mise en garde. »
languages.original_text: "The Marshal's poor judgement led to the fall of the Adeptus Arbites in the Expanse. As the leader of my House, I must learn from this cautionary tale."

traits.locale_text: « L'erreur de jugement commise par le maréchal a entraîné la chute de l'Adeptus Arbites dans les étendues. En tant que dirigeante de ma maison, je dois considérer cet incident comme une mise en garde. »

languages.text: «La falta de criterio del mariscal ha provocado la caída del Adeptus Arbites en la Extensión. Como líder de mi casa nobiliaria, debo aprender bien esta lección».
languages.original_text: "The Marshal's poor judgement led to the fall of the Adeptus Arbites in the Expanse. As the leader of my House, I must learn from this cautionary tale."

traits.locale_text: «La falta de criterio del mariscal ha provocado la caída del Adeptus Arbites en la Extensión. Como líder de mi casa nobiliaria, debo aprender bien esta lección».

languages.text: “元帅做出了错误的决定，导致科罗努斯扩区的法务部彻底垮台。身为家族的大族长，我必须从这件事情中吸取教训。”
languages.original_text: "The Marshal's poor judgement led to the fall of the Adeptus Arbites in the Expanse. As the leader of my House, I must learn from this cautionary tale."

traits.locale_text: “元帅做出了错误的决定，导致科罗努斯扩区的法务部彻底垮台。身为家族的大族长，我必须从这件事情中吸取教训。”

languages.text: "Adeptus Arbites, Miralay'ın zayıf muhakemesi yüzünden Enginlik suretinden silindi. Hanemin önderi olarak tüm bu yaşananlardan feyzalmalıyım."
languages.original_text: "The Marshal's poor judgement led to the fall of the Adeptus Arbites in the Expanse. As the leader of my House, I must learn from this cautionary tale."

traits.locale_text: "Adeptus Arbites, Miralay'ın zayıf muhakemesi yüzünden Enginlik suretinden silindi. Hanemin önderi olarak tüm bu yaşananlardan feyzalmalıyım."

languages.original_text: "The Marshal's poor judgement led to the fall of the Adeptus Arbites in the Expanse. As the leader of my House, I must learn from this cautionary tale."
